description: Borrowed from Latin repetitionem (accusative singular of repetitio; cf. French répétition). Doublet of repetitio.

entries.meaning: The act or an instance of repeating or being repeated.
(weightlifting): The act of performing a single, controlled exercise motion. A group of repetitions is a set.

verbs.description: repetition (third-person singular simple present repetitions, present participle repetitioning, simple past and past participle repetitioned)

examples: The group went through several rounds at different courts, petitioning and repetitioning, losing again and again.
